name: TyltGO
headline: TyltGO powers retailers with same-day delivery.
description: TyltGO provides brick & mortar retailers and e-commerce brands with same-day delivery under their own brand name.

founders.name: Aaron Paul, Founder
founders.description: Ever since a young age Aaron has always had an entrepreneurial mindset, from selling study notes in Grade 9, to building TyltGO currently. With both an entrepreneurial mindset and his broad technical skillset Aaron is the perfect fit for TyltGO as the Chief Technology Officer. Aaron currently is in the University of Waterloo studying Engineering and applies what he learns from the world renowned university daily with TyltGO.

raw_markdown="[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6977363252a77_icon-chevron-up.svg)](https://www.tyltgo.com/<#Top>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff5ce399114a61855e61803_logo_white.png)](https://www.tyltgo.com/</>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/60089ae7c1e52dca806bf76c_Tyltgo%20logo_white.png)](https://www.tyltgo.com/</>)[Same-Day](https://www.tyltgo.com/</same-day>)[Next-Day](https://www.tyltgo.com/</next-day>)[Blog](https://www.tyltgo.com/</blog>)[Couriers üöò](https://www.tyltgo.com/</couriers>)[Get Started](https://www.tyltgo.com/<#Get-Started>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e69774b7252a8b_icon-menu-white.svg)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6977363252a77_icon-chevron-up.svg)](https://www.tyltgo.com/<#Top>)
# Same-day & next-day parcel delivery.
A delivery partner that takes your business further, _faster_.
[Get Started](https://www.tyltgo.com/<#Get-Started>)
Already on the Tyltgo merchant network? [Log in](https://www.tyltgo.com/<https:/web.tyltgoapp.com/merchant/login>)
### **Trusted by leading brands across Canada**
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6979c5b252a7c_icon-star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6979c5b252a7c_icon-star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6979c5b252a7c_icon-star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6979c5b252a7c_icon-star.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/5ff49c5037e6979c5b252a7c_icon-star.svg)
99.99% delivery success, backed with money-back guarantee
Tyltgo separates itself from its competitors by focusing on **quality customer service** and providing an easy-to-use platform to allow our business to thrive.
###### Adam
Founder & CEO at ChefDrop (Local Same-Day)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/6227c54ef4f89c96bb3c8e62_1632424281320.Chefdrop_Dinning_Series_Fall_2021_logo_400x400.png)
Tyltgo allowed me to **focus on growing the business** instead of micro managing drivers.
###### Olek
CEO at Flower Co. (Local Same-Day)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/621fdeeb635c04daad52807d_flowerco.png)
Tyltgo is an incredible partner with a rich delivery experience that has helped **enable a whole new revenue channel** at Crafty Ramen. Their customer service is top-notch!
###### **Khalil**
Partner & CEO at Crafty Ramen (Ontario-wide, next-day)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/622b799c9dd8585323cb0122_F33BB039-3E1A-413A-AE08-3A1A3D55746A.png)
# How it works
# Deliver same day
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/62472f77acbab759f92d9ad3_order.png)
# 1
Customers place orders on your eCommerce website.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/62475158489489f102de80eb_upload.png)
# 2
You submit orders to the Tyltgo platform with a pickup date and time (through integration or CSV upload).
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/624759bbd22e455911dd3d7c_pack.png)
# 3
You pack your orders and attach labels provided by Tyltgo.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/624759a77f05a423ecad2e44_car.png)
# 4
Tyltgo picks up at the date and time you need.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/624759ac714a2ef6239063ec_sort.png)
# 5
Tyltgo couriers make the deliveries by the end of the same day, guaranteed.
‍[Learn more about same-day üëâüèΩ](https://www.tyltgo.com/</same-day>)
# Or, next day
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/624759ac714a2ef6239063ec_sort.png)
# 5
Tyltgo takes your parcels to a facility and sorts the packages into last-mile routes.[](https://www.tyltgo.com/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5ff49c50e9e1bb1d223efb8a/624759a8d22e45f571dd3d6d_complete.png)
# 6
Tyltgo couriers pickup the packages and make province-wide deliveries by the end of the next day, guaranteed.
‍[Learn more about Next-day üëâüèΩ](https://www.tyltgo.com/</next-day>)
# Frequently Asked Questions
###### What types of products can you deliver? Can you deliver fresh or frozen products?
We service a wide range of businesses, and deliver eCommerce products such as fashion or home items, as well as semi-perishables such as flowers and meal kits. We can also deliver products with special delivery requirements such as alcohol and prescription medicine.
If you can put it in a box, and it can last 3 hours from the time it‚Äôs picked up to the time it‚Äôs delivered, we can deliver it. If you need packaging partners to improve your perishability ‚Äì [get in touch with us](https://www.tyltgo.com/<https:/www.tyltgo.com/#Get-Started>) and we‚Äôll connect you.
###### How much does a delivery cost?
We provide the most competitive pricing in the regions we operate in by leveraging our highly efficient proprietary routing algorithm.
If you are a small business with a modest order volume, your next-day delivery rate is likely less than what you are paying Canada Post or Purolator for slow shipping. Contact us to receive a quote.
If you're a large retailer or an enterprise business, [please contact us](https://www.tyltgo.com/<https:/www.tyltgo.com/#Get-Started>) to get our preferred rates which are even more attractive!
###### What days and hours does Tyltgo deliver?
Tyltgo delivers 7 days a week, between 7:30am to 9pm.
###### What regions do you service right now?
We currently provide our delivery service in 200+ cities across Ontario and British Columbia. Please [get in touch with our team](https://www.tyltgo.com/<https:/www.tyltgo.com/#Get-Started>) to discuss your specific needs.
###### How do I know if I need same-day or next-day?
If you need your products to be delivered the same-day they‚Äôre picked up, [click here](https://www.tyltgo.com/</next-day>) to go to the same-day delivery page. If not, [click here](https://www.tyltgo.com/</same-day>) to go to the next-day delivery page.
[Next](https://www.tyltgo.com/<?8b541cb8_page=2>)
[](https://www.tyltgo.com/</archive/old-home-2>)

Ready to boost your customers‚Äô delivery experience?

generated_description:
**TyltGO: Revolutionizing Delivery for Retailers**

Founded in 2019 and proudly based in Kitchener, Canada, TyltGO emerged from Y Combinator's S20 batch with a bold mission: to empower brick-and-mortar retailers and e-commerce brands through seamless same-day delivery services. With a lean team of 15, the company has quickly carved a niche in the competitive delivery landscape, distinguishing itself with a 99.99% delivery success rate, underscored by a money-back guarantee.

At its core, TyltGO operates as a Software as a Service (SaaS) platform that allows retailers to offer their own branded delivery options. This focus on quality customer service and an intuitive platform enables businesses to reduce time spent micromanaging logistics while maximizing their operational efficiency. As retailers focus on growth, TyltGO handles the heavy lifting of delivery, making it an invaluable partner for local businesses across Ontario and British Columbia.

**The Process: Simple, Intuitive, Effective**

TyltGO simplifies the delivery experience with a straightforward five-step process:
1. Customers place orders on the retailer's eCommerce site.
2. Retailers submit the orders to TyltGO with preferred pickup details.
3. They pack orders, applying TyltGO's labels.
4. TyltGO picks up the packages at the scheduled time.
5. Couriers deliver the items by the end of the same day ‚Äî guaranteed.

Retailers can also choose next-day delivery, ensuring flexibility based on their customer needs.

**Broad Reach and Support for Diverse Products**

TyltGO's services are robust, catering to a variety of product types, including perishables and items with special delivery requirements. They are actively working with over 200 cities across Ontario and British Columbia, covering a wide range of delivery options seven days a week.

Retailers appreciate TyltGO not just for the efficiency but also for competitive pricing that often undercuts traditional carriers for timely services. Their unique proprietary routing technology helps maintain cost-effectiveness, especially for small businesses with smaller order volumes.

**Join the Movement**

For retail leaders looking to elevate their delivery game, TyltGO represents an opportunity to boost customer satisfaction and streamline logistics. With their commitment to service excellence and a growing network of satisfied clients, TyltGO is not just a delivery service; it's a partner in retail success. 

For more information or to get started, visit [TyltGO's website](https://www.tyltgo.com).
